divs: sighting detailsweird object here in san fernando valley\mission hills area california im in my apt on the second floor and i keep seeing my window this strange object that is pulsating & just staying in one place for about 30 minutes then moves slowly for a few seconds then sits for another 30 minutes then after a few hours it just vanishes i've seen it almost every other day since i moved here in may 2009 heres a link to a video of it with more coming soon
trends: There have been no other sightings in Mission Hills
